amendment.description: Amendment exempts military bases that are to be closed from coverage under the McKinney Homeless Assistance Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to accelerate the reuse process for closed military operations by eliminating the requirement that homeless providers be accommodated with regard to base closures under the provisions of the Stewart B. McKinney Homeless Assistance Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Molinari amendment (A012) Agreed to by recorded vote: 293 - 133 (Roll no. 379).
